mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHIPMENT (TRACKING_NUMBER, NUMBER_OF_ITEMS, SENDER_NAME, SENDER_PHONE, DEPARTURE_POSTALCODE, DEPARTURE_ADDRESS, DEPARTURE_DETAILADDRESS, DEPARTURE_EXTRAADDRESS, RECIPIENT_NAME, RECIPIENT_PHONE, DESTINATION_POSTALCODE, DESTINATION_ADDRESS, DESTINATION_DETAILADDRESS, DESTINATION_EXTRAADDRESS, TOTAL_PRICE, ITEM_PRICE, SHIPMENT_PASSWORD, VISITING_DATE, RESERVATION_DATE, SHIPMENT_TYPE_UID, REQUEST_UID, ITEM_TYPE_UID) VALUES (#{TRACKING_NUMBER}, #{NUMBER_OF_ITEMS}, #{SENDER_NAME}, #{SENDER_PHONE}, #{DEPARTURE_POSTALCODE}, #{DEPARTURE_ADDRESS}, #{DEPARTURE_DETAILADDRESS}, #{DEPARTURE_EXTRAADDRESS}, #{RECIPIENT_NAME},#{RECIPIENT_PHONE}, #{DESTINATION_POSTALCODE}, #{DESTINATION_ADDRESS}, #{DESTINATION_DETAILADDRESS}, #{DESTINATION_EXTRAADDRESS}, #{TOTAL_PRICE}, #{ITEM_PRICE}, #{SHIPMENT_PASSWORD}, #{VISITING_DATE}, SYSDATE(), #{SHIPMENT_TYPE_UID}, #{REQUEST_UID}, #{ITEM_TYPE_UID})
mapper.select: SELECT COMMON_BOARD.COMMONBOARD_UID, TITLE,VIEWS , CONTENT, DATE_CREATED, FILE_FOLDER_NAME, ORIGINALFILE_NAME FROM COMMON_BOARD LEFT JOIN ATTACHED_FILES ON COMMON_BOARD.COMMONBOARD_UID = ATTACHED_FILES.COMMONBOARD_UID WHERE BOARD_UID = 'BOARD_NOTICE' AND COMMON_BOARD.COMMONBOARD_UID = #{COMMONBOARD_UID};
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_NOTICE FROM COMMON_BOARD INNER JOIN MAIN_BOARD ON COMMON_BOARD.BOARD_UID = MAIN_BOARD.BOARD_UID WHERE MAIN_BOARD.BOARD_TYPE = 'NOTICE';
